About the Actor

Dr. John Gray is the author of 15 bestselling books, including Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus, which has sold more than 30 million copies in over 40 languages. An expert in the field of communication, Dr. Gray\\\'s focus is on helping men and women understand, respect and appreciate their differences in both their personal and professional relationships. He provides practical tools and insights to effectively manage stress and improve relationships at all stages and ages. 

Product Description

Flustered by the frustrating communication style of the opposite sex? You\\\'re not alone. But with a little insight and understanding, you can create less stressful, more fulfilling connections with your mate based on the ideas of John Gray -- the best-selling relationship author of all time. John offers valuable insights and tips such as why communication is the key to keeping passion alive, how to score \\\"points\\\" with your mate, and how the sexes differ in coping with stress and their need for support.
